title: Men of Harad (4R238)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot a site you control, spot 3 Southrons, and remove (2) to draw a card.
Lore:	The savage Haradrim, men from the kingdoms south of Gondor and Mordor, were called Southrons.
Rarity:	R
